scalar:array.comment: /* * This work is hereby released into the Public Domain. * To view a copy of the public domain dedication, * visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain/ or send a letter to * Creative Commons, 559 Nathan Abbott Way, Stanford, California 94305, USA. * */
/** * Build the border * * @param awColor $color Border color * @param int $style Border style */
/** * Change border color * This method automatically shows the border if it is hidden * * @param awColor $color */
/** * Draw border as a rectangle * * @param awDriver $driver * @param awPoint $p1 Top-left corner * @param awPoint $p2 Bottom-right corner */
/** * Draw border as an ellipse * * @param awDriver $driver * @param awPoint $center Ellipse center * @param int $width Ellipse width * @param int $height Ellipse height */

subNode:value.scalar:string: Class Border: Dashed and dotted borders and not yet implemented on ellipses.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Draw border as a polygon * * @param awDriver $driver A Driver object * @param awPolygon $polygon A Polygon object */
// In case of Line::SOLID, Driver::polygon() uses imagepolygon()
// which automatically closes the shape. In any other case,
// we have to do it manually here.
/** * Draws the last line of a Polygon, between the first and last point * * @param awDriver $driver A Driver object * @param awPolygon $polygon The polygon object to close */
